page.description: A SQL::RowSnapshot loads and stores the data for a single table row.

parameter.name: Data
parameter.description: A collection of SQL::ColumnValue objects that each contains the data for a specific column in the row.

parameter.name: Name
parameter.description: The unique name of the snapshot to be used if the snapshot is included in a collection of snapshots.

parameter.name: XML
parameter.description: The persisted XML string that describes the snapshot
